attributes.action: Make dash cams a legal requirement.
attributes.additional_details: Make dash cams compulsory to aid in road traffic collision evidence and to reduce the cost of insurance. Dash cams are now available for as little as £40, there is no reason everyone shouldn’t have one. Better models also come with what3words aiding breakdown companies on our busier and more dangerous “smart” motorways.
attributes.background: Make dash cams compulsory to aid in road traffic collision evidence and to reduce the cost of insurance.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585123
